attributes.action: People who are on unemployment benefits should do Community Service and help the Community
attributes.additional_details:
People who are on Unemployment benefits should be made to do Community service to help the community instead of playing games, getting tattoos and laying in bed all day!

The tax payer should not be helping pay out these benefits to people not willing to work or help the community, If community service is bought in for the unemployed maybe it will cut Anti social behavior incidents and help get Britain moving again!
